record.dc:title: 156HY13 Kays Landing Site 15HY13, Henry County, Tennessee. Pit # 14, roughly circular pit. Showing pit with rocks in site. Note scapula of deer projecting from under rocks at left. Square 37R10.
record.wpa:narrative: This pit contained about 80 rocks and considerable animal bone. Several scapulae of deer were found among the rocks. The fill was midden material with high content of bone, shell, ash, ole humus, but very little charcoal.
